statements: SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_name, study_start_date FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age <= 25 ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY study_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM participants
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT participant_name, age, study_start_date FROM participants WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY study_start_date DESC
SELECT participant_name, gender FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, gender, study_start_date FROM participants WHERE participant_name LIKE '%e%'
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT name, age FROM Participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, name, gender FROM Participants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Responses WHERE question LIKE '%favourite%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Responses;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender, contact_number FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Male' OR age < 25;
SELECT DISTINCT name, gender FROM Participants;
SELECT p.name, r.question, r.answer FROM Participants p, Responses r WHERE p.participant_id = r.participant_id AND r.timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY r.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Responses ORDER BY response_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM behaviors ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description, behavior_date FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.name, s.survey_question, s.survey_response FROM participants p JOIN surveys s ON p.participant_id = s.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name FROM Participants ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT survey_id, question1, question2, question3 FROM Surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, question1, question2 FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT observation_id, participant_id, observation_date, behavior_description FROM Observations WHERE observation_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT r.response_id, s.survey_id, s.survey_date, r.question_number, r.response_text FROM Responses r JOIN Surveys s ON r.survey_id = s.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_time FROM StudySessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM Questions ORDER BY question_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT response_id, answer FROM Responses WHERE question_id = 1 AND answer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT participant_id, name, age, email FROM Participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT session_id, participant_id, session_date, session_time FROM StudySessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY session_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT response_id, question_id, answer FROM Responses WHERE question_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM Questions WHERE LENGTH(question_text) > 50 ORDER BY question_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT researcher_id, name, expertise FROM Researchers ORDER BY expertise ASC, name ASC LIMIT 5
